definition: demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: An eldritch giant is most effective as a melee combatant.
sentences.chinese: 邪術巨人的近身戰鬥最爲有效。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not suffer a witch to live.
sentences.chinese: 行邪術的女人，不可容她存活。

sentences.english: Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.
sentences.chinese: 又不悔改他們那些兇殺，邪術，姦淫，偷竊的事。

sentences.english: Petition for bail from accused witches, ca. 1692.
sentences.chinese: 被控指邪術之保釋人訴狀。

sentences.english: Eldritch giants are powerful scions of arcane lore.
sentences.chinese: 邪術巨人是神祕奧術知識的強大傳承者。

sentences.english: And the delusions of their magic art were put down, and their boasting of wisdom was reproachfully rebuked.
sentences.chinese: 他們的邪術盡失效力，他們誇耀的學識，全蒙恥受辱。

definition: running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
to involve others (in a crime)/guilt by association
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
courtesy name of Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云[Zhao4 Yun2], general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
